channel.title: crypto on Blockchain Daily
channel.description: Recent content in crypto on Blockchain Daily

item.title: Crypto Update NEWS 2022-03-11
item.description: Payments Giant Stripe Launches Support for Crypto, NFTs (2 minute read) Businesses can now use Stripe as a payment method for crypto and NFT transactions.

item.title: Crypto Update NEWS 2022-03-08
item.description: Binance Sets Up Fiat-to-Crypto Payments Provider, Lends to FCA-Regulated Custodian (2 minute read) Binance set up its own fiat-to-crypto payments provider to help businesses become crypto-ready.

item.title: Crypto Update NEWS 2022-03-04
item.description: Leaked Images Suggest Opensea Plans to Add Solana-Based NFT Support (3 minute read) Leaked images show that leading NFT marketplace OpenSea may be adding Solana-based NFTs.

item.title: Crypto Update NEWS 2022-03-02
item.description: Osmosis introduces Superfluid Staking. How is this a game changer for the Cosmos ecosystem?

item.title: Crypto Update NEWS 2022-02-28
item.description: Microsoft’s Minecraft Goes Web3 With ‘NFT Worlds’ on Polygon (4 minute read) NFT Worlds is a metaverse built in Minecraft.

item.title: Crypto Update NEWS 2022-02-25
item.description: Invisible Friends NFTs Soar 5,000% as Mint Goes Live (2 minute read) Invisible Friends, one of the most anticipated NFT drops in the last few months, has gone live.

item.title: Crypto Update NEWS 2022-02-24
item.description: StarkWare Launches Layer 2 Product StarkNet on Ethereum (1 minute read) StarkWare’s StarkNet layer 2 protocol is ready for the deployment of decentralized apps.

item.title: Crypto Update NEWS 2022-02-23
item.description: Solana NFT Marketplace Magic Eden Is Airdropping Tokens, Launching DAO (4 minute read) Magic Eden, the top Solana NFT marketplace, is launching a decentralized autonomous organization called MagicDAO.

item.title: Crypto Update NEWS 2022-02-18
item.description: Interchain Accounts is the biggest upgrade to Cosmos since Stargate (2 minute read) The Interchain Foundation, a non-profit steward of the Cosmos ecosystem, has announced the release of Interchain Accounts, a protocol that allows blockchains to access the application features of other blockchains.

item.title: Crypto Update NEWS 2022-02-16
item.description: JP Morgan is first bank to enter the metaverse with a virtual ‘Onyx lounge’ (2 minute read) JP Morgan has opened up a virtual lounge in Decentraland.

item.title: Crypto Update NEWS 2022-02-15
item.description: “Reverse ISO” will see 20 million more SundaeSwap tokens given away (2 minute read) SundaeSwap, a decentralized exchange on the Cardano blockchain, launched on January 20 and soon became the leading Cardano DEX.

item.title: Crypto Update NEWS 2022-02-11
item.description: Samsung Unveils Crypto Wallet and Storage on New S22 Smartphone (2 minute read) Samsung unveiled Samsung Wallet along with its new Galaxy devices at its Unpacked 2022 event.

item.title: Crypto Update NEWS 2022-02-10
item.description: Salesforce tells employees it’s working on NFT cloud service (2 minute read) Salesforce plans to make a cloud service for creating NFTs and releasing content on marketplaces like OpenSea.

item.title: Crypto Update NEWS 2022-02-08
item.description: DeFi’s Aave Launches Web 3 Social Media Platform ‘Lens’ (2 minute read) Lens is a web3 social media protocol from Aave that allows anyone to create a non-custodial social media profile and build new social media applications.

item.title: Crypto Update NEWS 2022-02-02
item.description: ‘Pay’ Product Looks to Boost Stablecoin Payments on Solana (2 minute read) Solana Labs has released Solana Pay, a feature that lets merchants receive crypto payments in crypto.

item.title: Crypto Update NEWS 2022-01-28
item.description: Propy launches NFT platform in the US, allowing real-world property to be bought as an NFT (2 minute read) Propy is a blockchain startup that is launching real-estate-backed NFTs in the US.

item.title: Crypto Update NEWS 2022-01-25
item.description: Hundreds of Y Combinator alumni join crypto collective to back Web3 startups (4 minute read) Orange DAO is a crypto collective that was formed to scout out and back young crypto startups.

item.title: Crypto Update NEWS 2022-01-24
item.description: Latest Solana Clog Causes Liquidation Bloodbath (2 minute read) The Solana network suffered congestion issues over the weekend as crypto assets plummeted.

item.title: Crypto Update NEWS 2022-01-21
item.description: Facebook and Instagram will reportedly become major NFT marketplaces (8 minute read) Meta is preparing tools for creating and distributing non-fungible tokens (NFTs).

item.title: Crypto Update NEWS 2022-01-20
item.description: Opera launches a dedicated crypto browser (2 minute read) Opera has launched a web3 Crypto Browser that features a built-in crypto wallet, easy access to exchanges, support for decentralized apps, a secure clipboard that other apps can’t view, and more.

item.title: Crypto Update NEWS 2022-01-17
item.description: ‘Wen Token?’: Polymarket’s New Airdrop Futures Market Has Answers (3 minute read) Polymarket has launched Airdrop Futures, a new market where speculators can bet on whether projects will airdrop tokens.

item.title: Crypto Update NEWS 2022-01-11
item.description: BREAKING: Cash App begins rolling out the Lightning Network to its users (Twitter Thread) Cash App is now rolling out the Lightning Network to its users.
